mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DAILY (MEMBER_ID, DAILY_TITLE, DAILY_BODY, DAILY_WRITER, DAILY_VIEW, DAILY_PATH, DAILY_CREATE, DAILY_UPDATE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{write}, 0, #{path}, now(), now());

INSERT INTO TB_DAILY_COMMENT (MEMBER_ID, DAILY_ID, DAILY_COMMENT_BODY, DAILY_COMMENT_WRITER, DAILY_COMMENT_CREATE, DAILY_COMMENT_UPDATE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{dailyId}, #{content}, #{writer}, now(), now());

INSERT INTO TB_DAILY_IMAGE (MEMBER_ID, DAILY_ID, DAILY_FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, DAILY_FILE_FULL_NAME, DAILY_FILE_SAVE_NAME, DAILY_FILE_PATH, DAILY_FILE_SIZE, DAILY_FILE_TYPE, DAILY_FILE_CREATE, DAILY_FILE_UPDATE) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{dailyId}, #{originalName}, #{originalFullName}, #{saveName}, #{path}, #{size}, #{ext}, now(), now());
mapper.select: SELECT d.DAILY_ID, d.DAILY_TITLE, d.DAILY_PATH, d.DAILY_VIEW, d.DAILY_CREATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_COMMENT WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_COMMENT FROM TB_DAILY AS d WHERE DAILY_YN = 'N' ORDER BY d.DAILY_ID DESC

SELECT d.DAILY_ID, d.DAILY_TITLE, d.DAILY_PATH, d.DAILY_VIEW, d.DAILY_CREATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_COMMENT WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_COMMENT FROM TB_DAILY AS d WHERE DAILY_YN = 'N' AND d.DAILY_CREATE BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY d.DAILY_ID DESC

SELECT d.DAILY_ID, d.DAILY_TITLE, d.DAILY_PATH, d.DAILY_VIEW, d.DAILY_CREATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_COMMENT WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_COMMENT FROM TB_DAILY AS d ORDER BY d.DAILY_ID DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT d.DAILY_ID, d.MEMBER_ID, d.DAILY_TITLE, d.DAILY_BODY, d.DAILY_WRITER, d.DAILY_PATH, d.DAILY_VIEW, d.DAILY_CREATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_LIKE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DAILY_COMMENT WHERE DAILY_ID = d.DAILY_ID) AS DAILY_COMMENT FROM TB_DAILY AS d WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId} AND DAILY_YN = 'N'
SELECT DAILY_LIKE_ID FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE DAILY_LIKE_ID = #{dailyLikeId}
SELECT DAILY_LIKE_ID FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND DAILY_ID = #{dailyId}
SELECT DAILY_LIKE_ID FROM TB_DAILY_LIKE WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId}
SELECT * FROM TB_MEMBER_BOARDSCRAP_DAILY WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT DAILY_FILE_PATH FROM TB_DAILY_IMAGE WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_DAILY_COMMENT WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId} AND DAILY_COMMENT_ID = #{commentId}
DELETE FROM TB_MEMBER_BOARDSCRAP_DAILY WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId} AND MEMBER_DAILY_BOARDSCRAP_ID = #{scrapId}
DELETE FROM TB_DAILY_IMAGE WHERE DAILY_ID = #{dailyId} AND DAILY_FILE_PATH = #{path}
